reviews.name: Wei Jia
reviews.text:
I have experienced repeated issues with appointment scheduling, responsiveness, and clinic management, which have caused me significant inconvenience.
Firstly, scheduling an appointment has been unnecessarily difficult. Despite my efforts to book in advance, I frequently face long waiting times and delays. The front desk staff assured me they would inform me of my appointment time, but after waiting for three weeks without any update, I had to follow up myself. This lack of communication is highly unprofessional and frustrating. I schedule appointments for my convenience, not for the convenience of your clinic, and I expect better service.
Secondly, when I have an issue with my braces, I am required to wait for my assigned doctor to return, even though I have explicitly stated that any available doctor could assist me. This rigid system leads to unnecessary delays in my treatment, which is unacceptable.
Moreover, I do not understand how such a large and well-established dental clinic lacks the necessary tools for treatment. On multiple occasions, I have been told that certain tools were unavailable, causing further delays. This is highly concerning and raises questions about the clinic‚Äôs preparedness and efficiency.

Dr. Beatrix fixed my second veneers quickly and precisely, aligning them just as i wanted. she even offered a previous veneers touch-up to match my request. the entire procedure was painless‚Äîi almost dozed off... they also did a 3D scan for my retainers, which was impressive. overall, a great experience with excellent customer service at the front desk too!

8/3 Doctor Beatrix is amazing. she recommended me to do veneers instead aligners, which saved me a ton of money. she recommended me the right and suitable treatment without pressuring, i even said i can do the other service with my other dentist and she‚Äôs totally okay with it. the consultation includes a mock up demo, she answers all my questions and explained carefully. to my surprise their consultation fee was so affordable?? i decided on the spot.

the whole experience was very pleasant and it finished on time as promised. once my veneers was fixed, i was very satisfied with the results, exactly as i wanted. i paid happily and am already thinking for another veneer fix there soon!

not to mentioned that i am also so pleased with their service, right at my first contact point. their customer service is top notched, from enquiring on whatsapp, to fixing an appointment, they are so helpful and attentive. i‚Äôve never been this pleased about a dental visit before! üòÜ

reviews.name: Nabilah
reviews.text:
Great service and they tried their best to accommodate to my timing as I was only going to be in KL for a few days! Came for the ICON resin infiltration treatment for my white spots and am amazed by the results. Was a bit skeptical regarding the effectiveness of the treatment but it was really successful in removing the white spots that I‚Äôve had my whole life. I think it‚Äôs due to the Dr being very meticulous üëçüèΩ He also explained the procedure well. Thank you to the Dr and the assistant for being so patient and trying their best to achieve the best results. Especially to the assistant for being kind and helping me feel comfortable! Whole treatment lasted around 3 hours for 6 teeth including consultation and scaling.

However I felt that the team could have better prepared me for the post treatment implications of wearing a mouth opener for too long, it was okay for the first two hours but the last hour it started to feel very uncomfortable. Although the team constantly checked in with me on my comfort level, and encouraged me to relax and bite/close my mouth the issue for me was how hard it was pressing against my gums. Ended the treatment having really painful and sore gums due to the prolonged pressure and irritated and bumpy skin around the corners of my mouth (I also have sensitive skin). Just a note to those who are thinking of doing the treatment close to any special event they have.

reviews.name: Julie Wong
reviews.text: This is by far my best dental experience. I requested a full checkup and Dr Genia recommended 2 fillings and scaling to remove plaque buildup. The entire hour or so procedure was painless and even pleasant‚Äîwhich I think speaks of the precision and care of the dentist. Soothing music played in the background and you couldn‚Äôt wish for a dentist with a kinder, more gentle or compassionate demeanor than Dr Genia. With the aid of a mirror the doc showed me the problem areas and laid out the remedies. The old oxidized black amalgam filling was replaced with natural white composite filling. I also noticed that the clinic was so clean some patients walked around barefoot and staff were extremely kind. There‚Äôs also free espresso you can help yourself to in a corner. I am happy to say that this is the first time that I had enjoyed a dentist visit or felt more at ease: most experiences left me with an ouch in the mouth and an ouch in the pocket. Finally I found a dentist who shares my belief that a dentist visit shouldn‚Äôt be painful nor something to be feared. Kudos to J&G clinic for being a new age dental clinic with a heart. üôèüòçü•∞üòòüåπ

reviews.name: wxb
reviews.text: This is hands down the best dental clinic I have ever visited. For the first time in my life, a dentist actually explained in details what is the issue, what options do I have, what is the procedure of the treatment, how the treatment can help address the issue, the limit of such treatment, and what I should do to avoid exacerbating the condition. What's more, the doctor was gentle and professional, and the treatment wasn't as painful as I initially expected, in fact I almost felt nothing. For someone who had visited a lot of dental clinics before, this is a very new and reassuring experience. If I had met the doctor sooner, my teeth would be in a much better condition. Highly recommend.

reviews.text: Was attended to by Kenn for the initial online consult, he is very knowledgeable on DCA (having gone through the process himself) and attended patiently to my queries. Responses were super prompt as well, all in all it was a great experience! :)

reviews.name: Hui peng
reviews.text:
I have been wearing clear aligners from DCA Clinic for three years now, and the result has been extremely disappointing and distressing.

From the very beginning, the clinic never mentioned that I needed extractions. They simply pushed me into wearing aligners and forcibly moved my teeth outward. As a result, my teeth are still misaligned, and I now have severe protrusion (buck teeth), with my bite completely off and my facial profile noticeably altered. This has caused me immense anxiety and loss of confidence over the years. I‚Äôve wasted not only a significant amount of money but also three precious years of my life.

Later on, I consulted several professional dental clinics, and every single one of them told me that I needed to have at least four teeth extracted before starting orthodontic treatment. DCA completely overlooked this and failed to give me a proper diagnosis or treatment plan. They just pushed forward with the aligners without truly considering what was best for my dental health.

I deeply regret choosing DCA. I‚Äôm sharing my experience to warn others: always consult multiple professional orthodontists and confirm whether extractions are necessary before starting treatment. Don‚Äôt blindly believe promises like ‚Äúfast results‚Äù or ‚Äúno need for extractions.‚Äù You may end up like me‚Äîpaying a high price not just financially, but physically and emotionally as well.

I hope DCA will take responsibility for my case and offer a formal response. And to anyone considering clear aligners: please do your research carefully.
